challenges.title: Hidden in /etc
challenges.description:
Investigate sensitive files under /etc and recover the hidden indicator left in a misconfigured config chain.

Hint: Follow nginx include directives (grep -R include /etc), then inspect hidden files under /etc/.config_chain.

challenges.title: Permission Denied
challenges.description: Analyze ownership and mode bits to fix access controls and retrieve the protected flag artifact.

challenges.title: SUID Secrets
challenges.description: Enumerate SUID binaries and identify an escalation path that exposes privileged execution context.

challenges.title: Cron Exploit
challenges.description: Review scheduled jobs, writable paths, and execution timing to exploit an unsafe cron task.

challenges.title: Shadow Hunter
challenges.description: Inspect shadow artifacts safely, identify weak hash strategy, and recover credential evidence.

challenges.title: Reverse Shell Drop
challenges.description: Trace a reverse shell deployment chain and identify the exact command sequence that enabled access.

challenges.title: Bash Injection
challenges.description: Exploit unsafe shell command construction and demonstrate controlled command injection output.

challenges.title: Root Me
challenges.description: Chain Linux misconfigurations to escalate from a low-privilege shell to root-level access.

challenges.title: Kernel Panic
challenges.description: Analyze kernel version context and exploit feasibility signals to identify a viable privilege escalation vector.

challenges.title: Log Miner
challenges.description: Mine auth and service logs to reconstruct attacker behavior and extract the hidden incident marker.

challenges.title: Zombie Process
challenges.description: Investigate abnormal process trees and exploit process-management weaknesses to recover target evidence.

challenges.title: Kali Recon Lab
challenges.description: Use core Kali reconnaissance workflow to identify services, likely weaknesses, and final target indicator.
